text: be‘iwiri layi (kezemecha bemek’itu) hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ be’anikasami layi hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ bebeshitenyami layi hat’i’ati yelebetimi፡፡ alahinina melikitenyawinimi yemitazezi sewi kesirochachewi wenizochi yemifesubachewini genetochi yagebawali፡፡ yemisheshewinimi sewi asamamiwini k’it’ati yik’et’awali፡፡
